entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
